hero.pullquote: "he's got that raw bad boy attitude... just need to tame it"
hero.label: DJ / Producer — SCOTTSDALE, AZ

about.pullquote: Phoenix heat, late nights, dark rooms.
bio: DJ and producer building trance house that doesn't ask for permission—it just takes the room. Dark, high-energy, made for 3 a.m. when the filters are off and people actually move.

No chasing trends, no forced hype. Just clean, heavy sound that hits your chest and stays there. Raw emotion wrapped in tight rhythm. Tracks that don't fade, sets that don't apologize, a brand that shows up the same way every time: intentional, untouchable, a little dangerous.
Step in. Feel it. Get on the ride.
about.philosophy: GRLSCRY: Dark House That Hits Different. High Energy, Late Nights, No Compromises. Ready to Feel the Pulse? Explore Releases, Gigs, and the Raw Behind the Beats.
about.tools: Ableton Live 12 · Serum 2 · Pioneer DDJ-400 · Pioneer DDJ-GRV6 · CDJ 30000 · CDJ 20000 · DJM · A-Series
about.inspiration: GRLSCRY pulls from the real late-night underbelly: blacked-out warehouses, bass that hits your chest, feral crowds moving like tomorrow's cancelled. Sweat, smoke, glances that stick under dim strobes. Built by people who already own the room. Beats land with quiet empathy, natural charisma, subtle edge. Slowed techno that shifts your head, indie dance built for 2026.

contact.blurb: Available for bookings across Phoenix, Scottsdale, and beyond. Corporate packages available under a separate EPK. Reach out with your date, venue, and budget.
